ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: DAGs With Omitted Objects Displayed (DAGWOOD) is a framework to help reveal key hidden assumptions in a causal DAG. This package provides an implementation of the DAGWOOD algorithm. Further description can be found in Haber et al (2022) <DOI:10.1016/j.annepidem.2022.01.001>.

DAGs With Omitted Objects Displayed (DAGWOOD) is a framework to help reveal key hidden assumptions in a causal DAG. This package provides an implementation of the DAGWOOD algorithm. Further description can be found in Haber et al (2022) <DOI:10.1016/j.annepidem.2022.01.001>.

name: r-dagwood
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dagwood
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/dagwood_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/dagwood/dagwood_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dfb5d7e7598c3b80078a188bdda8064d52373f3b72d7e51d43627f571dd7e6d2

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dagitty
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dagitty

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('dagwood')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('dagwood')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dagwood
  license: MIT
  summary: DAGs With Omitted Objects Displayed (DAGWOOD) is a framework to help reveal key hidden
    assumptions in a causal DAG. This package provides an implementation of the DAGWOOD
    algorithm. Further description can be found in Haber et al (2022) <DOI:10.1016/j.annepidem.2022.01.001>.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
